languages.text: "Архивы будут уничтожены во избежание повторения этой ситуации. Эмелина... моя ответственность".
"The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."
languages.original_text: "Архивы будут уничтожены во избежание повторения этой ситуации. Эмелина... моя ответственность".

traits.locale_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

languages.text: “那些资料会被销毁，以免类似的情况再次发生。至于艾米莉娜……由我负责。”
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: “那些资料会被销毁，以免类似的情况再次发生。至于艾米莉娜……由我负责。”

languages.text: «Los archivos serán destruidos para evitar que esta situación se repita. Emelina... es responsabilidad mía».
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: «Los archivos serán destruidos para evitar que esta situación se repita. Emelina... es responsabilidad mía».

languages.text: 「このような状況が二度と起こらないように、アーカイブは破棄されます。エメリナは…私の責任です」
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: 「このような状況が二度と起こらないように、アーカイブは破棄されます。エメリナは…私の責任です」

languages.text: « Les archives seront détruites pour empêcher que cette situation se reproduise. Emelina... est ma responsabilité. »
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: « Les archives seront détruites pour empêcher que cette situation se reproduise. Emelina... est ma responsabilité. »

languages.text: "Die Archive werden zerstört, damit diese Situation nie mehr eintreten kann. Emelina ... fällt in meine Verantwortung."
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Die Archive werden zerstört, damit diese Situation nie mehr eintreten kann. Emelina ... fällt in meine Verantwortung."

languages.text: "Arşivler, bu durumun bir daha tekrar etmesini önlemek adına yok edilecek. Emelina... Benim sorumluluğum."
languages.original_text: "The archives will be destroyed to prevent this situation from ever reoccurring. Emelina... is my responsibility."
